name: ElectroShop Sound Systems
desc: ASP.NET Core MVC project is an e-commerce platform, featuring functionalities like blog comments and social media sharing, email and OTP verification, product creation and review, discount management, and an admin panel for website modifications.

name: Hospital Platform
desc: The Hospital Platform project is designed for managing healthcare services, including functionalities for reserving doctor appointments, viewing analysis results, and additional features to streamline hospital operations and enhance patient care.
